testcase.name: Simple product search
testcase.system-out: When User open google.com...................................................passed And he search for 'shop eriks nl'...........................................passed And click on the result http://shop.eriks.nl................................passed And change the language to English..........................................passed And enter 'loctite' in the search input box.................................passed Then check if the product 'LOCTITE Loctite 4601-20 GR' is present in the results.passed
